DOC.brief_title: Using CHWs HPV Home Tests Increase Cervical Cancer Screening Minority Populations
DOC.detailed_description: Building exist community partnership , propose randomize CBPR study among 600 woman three underserved community Miami-Dade County determine optimal approach increase cervical cancer screen among Caribbean underserved woman . The study three arm study 200 woman randomize site 3 year . Women control group would expose NCI approve culturally linguistically appropriate outreach educational material cervical cancer screening . Our two specific aim 1 ) determine compare control group , woman randomize community health worker intervention group consist one one health education facilitation referral exist screen program result increase proportion woman screen 2 ) determine compare CHW group , woman randomize CHW intervention addition home base self-sampling strategy result additional increase proportion woman screen versus CHW group without HPV sample . Secondary outcome include comparison ) measure access care ( health insurance , usual source care , visit provider six month ) b ) cost provide intervention order determine cost recruit individual woman screen c ) among woman abnormal screen , time follow-up testing .
